title: Osaango
description: Coordinates the global APIOps Cycles community and method development. Provides consulting, training and method support globally, main partner in the Nordics.

title: Codecentric
description: Provides expert content, consulting, and promotes the method in the DACH region.

title: APIsFirst
description: Provides consulting and team coaching for getting value from API-related investments and API economics, using the method to accelerate understanding and impact. Global reach with local focus in the UK and Australia.

title: Konneqt
description: Offers advanced API and integration platforms and supports QAP Canvas development.
